About Me

Hello! I'm Tyagaraj S D, a passionate AI Engineer at Deepcept AI. I specialize in AI/ML, and I am proficient in Python, C#, and various advanced tools and frameworks.

Skills

  • AI/ML Development
  • Python & C# Programming
  • Docker & ROS
  • Hugging Face & LLaMA
  • SQL & Data Analysis

Projects

Project 1: Text-to-Image Generation Using Hugging Face Model "MoonDream

I developed a Text-to-Image Generation project that utilizes the Hugging Face model "MoonDream" to transform text into visually stunning images. Integrated with a Telegram bot, users can simply type a sentence or speak their idea, and the bot will generate images that match their text or spoken prompts. This project highlights my skills in AI/ML, interactive development, and user-centric design, creating a seamless and engaging experience for users..

Project 2: Gun Detection Using YOLOv7 Model

In this project, I leveraged the YOLOv7 model, known for its high accuracy and speed, to create a real-time object detection system focused on detecting guns. While YOLOv7 is trained on 80 classes, I customized it to detect a single class — guns — ensuring precise and reliable identification. This project showcases my expertise in computer vision and deep learning, demonstrating the application of advanced models to enhance safety and security

Project 2: Chikmagalur Travel Guide Website

I developed a comprehensive Chikmagalur Travel Guide website designed to enhance the travel experience for users exploring this beautiful destination. The website features detailed information about popular attractions, local cuisine, accommodations, and travel tips. With interactive maps and user-friendly navigation, visitors can easily plan their trip and discover key spots in Chikmagalur. This project showcases my ability to create functional and visually appealing web applications that serve as practical resources for travelers.
